Text:
If you want to unlock other Editions of Windows 7 e.g. You have an Ultimate or any other Windows 7 ISO and you need or want to unlock the remaining Editions, then follow the steps below:


1) Open the ISO with e.g. PowerISO
2) Open the "Sources" Folder
3) Find the "ei.cfg" file and delete or rename it.
4) Continue with the steps outlined above importing the "$OEM$" folder and placing it in the "Sources" folder.
5) save the ISO.


JOB DONE!!!
works perfectly thanks for your work
